EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - New Tricentis Professional Program - 2014.11.21.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: New Tricentis Professional Program – Available Jan 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: New Tricentis Professional Program – Available Jan 2015
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
In January 2015, the Tricentis Training team will be introducing a new Professional Training Program that will replace the current training modules. The new training program is designed to equip students with the necessary theoretical and practical knowledge that will enable them to immediately use Tosca Testsuite for any testing project. The new Training Program will be offered as blended learning modules in order to cater to customer needs.
In preparation for the launch of the new Professional Training Program, Xaver Benz, head of Tricentis Training, will be presenting two webinars to introduce the changes that have been made and what this means for you:
- 21 November 2014 3:00pm – 4:00pm CET - 27 November 2014 12:30pm – 1:30pm CET
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-new-tricentis-professional-program-2011.11.21.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-new-tricentis-professional-program-2011.11.21.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Fri Nov 21, 2014 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. CET 9:00 a.m. – 10:00 a.m. EST Thu Nov 27, 2014 12:30 p.m. – 1:30 p.m. CET 6:30 a.m. – 7:30 a.m. EST
Xaver Benz Head of Tricentis Training Tricentis
